= camel get route-controller

List status of route controller


== Usage

[source,bash]
----
camel get route-controller [options]
----



== Options

[cols="2,5,1,2",options="header"]
|===
| Option | Description | Default | Type
| `--depth` | Max depth of stack-trace | 1 | int
| `--header` | Include controller configuration details | true | boolean
| `--sort` | Sort by id, or state | id | String
| `--trace` | Include stack-traces in error messages | true | boolean
| `--watch` | Execute periodically and showing output fullscreen |  | boolean
| `-h,--help` | Display the help and sub-commands |  | boolean
|===
